How to Escape from Cameras in Bob The Robber?

controls: Use the A or D keys or the Left and Right Arrow keys to move BobUse the W key or the Upper Arrow key to climb up a stair or use an elevatorPress the W key or the Upper Arrow key to search for valuable items among the boxes or casesPress the W key or the Upper Arrow key and hold the key to open a locked doorPress the W key or the Upper Arrow key to unlock a coded door by using the 0-9 numbersPress the W key or the Upper Arrow key to cut the power to disable the laser system
content.howToPlay:
Bob has a story. His deep admiration for Robin Hood since childhood led him to this path. He trained himself for years. And now he feels ready for more significant tasks. Now it is crusade time for him. He completed all his preparations. Now it is time to witness the 5 biggest robberies in the world.

There are five major venues expected to be robbed in Bob The Robbery. There are different environments, from the most vulnerable to those with the most advanced technologies. First, you will start robbing a house. After completing this, it is time for the jewelry shop. You will finish the game by robbing a casino.Every place has its own defense system. You must overcome these obstacles one by one. For example, you can disable the laser defense system by cutting off the electricity. Or you can bypass security cameras by hiding in blind spots.
